Package com.freedomotic.helpers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SerialPortListener  
    UdpListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HttpHelper  
    SerialHelper
    Provides connection to serial ports and handles serial port reading and writing.
    TcpHelper
    This class offers a timeout feature on socket connections.
    UdpHelper
    This class implements an UDP server listening for incoming packets and provides a method to send UDP packets to a specified server
